attributes.action: Realign the Labour Party back to traditional labour values.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The labour party at the moment seem to be a high tax party that is more in keeping with Tory values in taxing the poor and low earners out of existance, council tax rising at appalling rates every year, stealth taxes at the highest they have been for years, crime and drug misuse out of control,taxation posts (speed cameras)replacing police officers on the roads,imigration at high levels,unemployment going up,hospitals unclean,housing a major issue for our children,and wars costing us our money and respect with the rest of the world.

The Labour party are supposed to be the party of the people for the people,a party to look after our elderley,our sick,our society,i see nothing but rhetoric from "new labour" it is time to get back to traditional Labour at this rate of decline labour will lose the next ellection.
